r.s: Map IP address to geographic places
r.d: This PHP extension allows you to find the location of an IP address - City, State, Country, Longitude, Latitude, and other information as all, such as ISP and connection type. For more info, please visit Maxmind's website.
r.n: * Add geoip_setup_custom_directory() to setup custom directories per request. * Remove E_NOTICES for IPs not found in database. * Fix a segfault with geoip_db_get_all_info() on newer libs (bug #64692). * Add support for geoip_netspeedcell_by_name(), geoip_asnum_by_name() and geoip_domain_by_name() (bug #67121). * Fix memory leak with custom directories (bug #67138). * Support changing custom directory via ini_set() (bug #61607).
